text: Rudolph Valentino Regalado (May 21, 1930 - February 12, 2018) was an American Major League Baseball player. He was an infielder for the Cleveland Indians from 1954 to 1956, and played in the 1954 World Series.Rudy Regalado Baseball Stats by Baseball Almanac He was born in Los Angeles, California. Regalado died on February 12, 2018 in San Diego, California of a pulmonary embolism at the age of 87.Rudolph Valentino Regalado Obituary ==References== ==Other websites== , or Baseball Reference MiLB *Venezuelan Professional Baseball League statistics Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Rudy Regalado
